channel.title: RMR Blog
channel.description:
Changes or remarks that I have concerning The RenderMan Repository are found here.

NOTE: This is not the redesign for the RMR. This is just a temporary way for me to get the Blog going.

item.title: SRT - 2008
item.description: So I have several presentations from this yearâ€™s Stupid RAT Tricks: SRT2008

item.title: Retired Twiki for mediawiki
item.description:
Twiki was taking too much time to setup and manage. Opted for mediawiki which seems much more direct to set up.

Switched the links and redid the Otherlinks page in mediawiki format.

Also added Pixie which got lost in the original twiki setup.

item.title: Fixed Nav links
item.description: Fixed nav links for OFFSITE and TWKI.

item.title: Disney pubs
item.description:
I just uploaded 3 documents that Disney is allowing me to share with the RenderMan community.

One is some notes that Brent Burely put together as he was trying to understand filtering in PRMan. These can be found in the show and tell section:

PRMan Filtering

The other two documents are two parts of a talk that Mark Hammel and I gave at Disney Animation back in the winter of 2007. These can be found in the Publications section:

RenderMan Nuts & Bolts.

item.title: RMR face lift.
item.description: Thanks to Tom Craigen, the RMR is starting to get a much needed facelift. There are a few kinks that need working out and there are a few more things to come. But some of the more obvious things are in place.
